title: Not Obtaining Hextech Chests.
body:
Quite a while ago, I was playing a match of League of Legends, like most League of Legends players do. My friend created a normal unranked game, with a full party of people, myself included. At the end of the game, which we won, a third person in the group got an S or an S- or something like that. My friend obtained a Hextech Chest, and I didn't. I have never been punished by the Tribunal other than a couple of minor AFK penalties from a while before that, and I had the potential to get a chest; I have only opened a few since their release, and I play somewhat frequently. Does anyone know why this is happening? I haven't found any reason as to why I shouldn't have gotten the chest, and I have looked all over this website on Hextech Crafting.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}

replies.body: Zombiemaster provided some great information that I hope it was able to help!  One of the most common occurrences for not receiving a chest is indeed already earning it for that champion per season.  Another is that the champion must be owned to receive a chest.  Without knowing the champion you were playing, I'm guessing this may have been one of the reasons.  Hope that helps, and best of luck in your next games!

If you want more information, you can read [this FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide). There is a section explaining why you might not be earning chests.

My guess for why you didn't earn a chest in this situation is that you were playing a champion that you have already earned a chest for. You can only earn one chest per champion per season, so if you are playing a champion that you have already earned a chest for, then you will not earn another chest while playing as that champion, even if someone in your premade party gets an S grade.

Good to know. Thank you very much for the help! As I said, it was a long time ago, so I don't know, but it's good to be aware of things like this for the future. Again, thank you very much.
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
